channel.title: 317 pi Help with brackets

item.title: 317 pi Help with brackets
item.dc:creator: @JavaLearner JavaLearner
item.description:
@JavaLearner wrote:

FIX:

if(c.randomQuest <= 0) { c.sendMessage("You must talk to Dr.Jekyll to talk to him"); return; } else if(c.randomQuest == 1) { c.sendMessage("Go kill Hyde."); return; } else if(c.randomQuest == 2) { c.sendMessage("Go talk to Jekyll after you killed Hyde."); return; } else if(c.randomQuest == 3) { c.sendMessage("Go talk to the Monks northwest of Jekyll."); } break; case 658: if(c.randomQuest == 4 && c.getItems().playerHasItem(6685, 28)) { c.getDH().sendDialogues(316, npcType); c.getItems().deleteItem2(6685, 28); } return; } else if(c.randomQuest == 4) { c.sendMessage("You dont have 28 Saradomin Brews(4)."); return; } else if(c.randomQuest == 4) { c.sendMessage("You already gave him the required items."); return; } else if(c.randomQuest == 5) { c.sendMessage("Go talk to Evil Bob"); } break; case 2479: if(c.randomQuest == 6) { c.sendMessage("You slayed the chicken talk to Evil Bob."); } return; } else if(c.randomQuest == 7) { c.sendMessage("@gr2@You already killed the Evil Chicken"); return; } else if(c.randomQuest == 8) { c.sendMessage("@gr2@Go talk to Thorvald."); } break; case 1289: if(c.randomQuest == 11) { c.sendMessage("You slayed the Rock Golem go talk to Father Urhney."); } break; case 458: if(c.randomQuest == 12 && c.getItems().playerHasItem(30, 2) && c.getItems().playerHasItem(536, 2))) { c.getDH().sendDialogues(316, npcType); c.getItems().deleteItem2(30, 2); c.getItems().deleteItem2(536, 2); return; } } else if(c.randomQuest == 13) { c.sendMessage("You dont have 2 Bucket of wax and 2 Dragon Bones."); return; } else if(c.randomQuest == 13) { c.sendMessage("You already gave him the required items."); return; } else if(c.randomQuest == 14) { c.sendMessage("Go talk to Father Aerick!"); } break; case 456: if(c.randomQuest == 15) { c.sendMessage("Go kill the Fire Warrior."); } return; } else if(c.randomQuest == 16) { c.getDH().sendDialogues(355, npcType); } break; case 28: if(c.randomQuest == 17) { c.sendMessage("Go talk to the Gardener!"); } break; case 36: if(c.randomQuest == 18) { c.sendMessage("Go talk to the Captain!"); } break; case 437: if(c.randomQuest == 19) { c.sendMessage("Go and slay the Demon of the Woods!"); } return; } else if(c.randomQuest == 20) { c.getDH().sendDialogues(379, npcType); } break; case 541: if(c.randomQuest == 9) { c.getDH().sendDialogues(337, npcType); } return; } else if(c.randomQuest == 10) { c.sendMessage("Go talk to Zeke and kill the Rock Golem"); return; } else if(c.randomQuest == 21) { c.sendMessage("@gr2@You already completed the quest"); } break;
